alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aitkin, southwestern St. Louis and northwestern Carlton Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Floodwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin
